languages.text: "Человек-без-сердца взял чужую ношу. Его долгом было исцелять, но он отправлял к Неумирающему тех, чей срок не пришел. Он был... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}жесток{/d}. И не желал останавливаться".

traits.locale_text: "Человек-без-сердца ставил отвратительные опыты над больными и усопшими. По его вине множество душ отправилось в длани Неумирающего раньше срока. И он не желал останавливаться".

languages.text: "The Heartless Man took on a burden that was not his to bear. His duty was to heal, but instead he sent people to the Undying One, people whose time had not yet come. He was... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. And had no intention of ever stopping."
languages.original_text: "Человек-без-сердца взял чужую ношу. Его долгом было исцелять, но он отправлял к Неумирающему тех, чей срок не пришел. Он был... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}жесток{/d}. И не желал останавливаться".

traits.locale_text:
"The Heartless One picked up a burden that was not his to bear. He had a duty to heal, but he sent people to the Undying One whose time had not come yet. He was...
cruel. And had no intention of stopping."

cruel. And had no intention of stopping."

"The Heartless Man took on a burden that was not his to bear. His duty was to heal, but instead he sent people to the Undying One, people whose time had not yet come. He was... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. And had no intention of ever stopping."

languages.text: « Le Sans-Cœur a accepté un fardeau qui n'était pas le sien. Alors que son devoir était de guérir, il a envoyé devant l'Immortel des âmes dont l'heure n'était pas encore venue. Il était... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. Et n'avait aucune intention de s'arrêter. »
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man took on a burden that was not his to bear. His duty was to heal, but instead he sent people to the Undying One, people whose time had not yet come. He was... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. And had no intention of ever stopping."

traits.locale_text: « Le Sans-Cœur a accepté un fardeau qui n'était pas le sien. Alors que son devoir était de guérir, il a envoyé devant l'Immortel des âmes dont l'heure n'était pas encore venue. Il était... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. Et n'avait aucune intention de s'arrêter. »

languages.text: «El Despiadado asumió una carga que no le correspondía. Su labor era curar, pero envió a gente al Inmortal. A gente cuya hora no había llegado. Era... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. Y no tenía intención de detenerse».
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man took on a burden that was not his to bear. His duty was to heal, but instead he sent people to the Undying One, people whose time had not yet come. He was... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. And had no intention of ever stopping."

traits.locale_text: «El despiadado asumió una carga que no le correspondía. Su labor era curar, pero envió a gente al Inmortal. A gente cuya hora no había llegado. Era... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. Y no tenía intención de detenerse».

languages.text: 「無情なる男は背負う必要のない義務を背負っていた。彼の仕事は治療だというのに、代わりに民を不死の者の元へ送り込んだのよ。彼は…{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}冷酷{/d}だわ。そしてそれを止める気は全くない様子だった」
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man took on a burden that was not his to bear. His duty was to heal, but instead he sent people to the Undying One, people whose time had not yet come. He was... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. And had no intention of ever stopping."

traits.locale_text: 「無情なる者は背負う必要のない義務を背負っていた。彼の仕事は治療だというのに、代わりに民を不死の者の元へ送り込んだのよ。彼は…{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}冷酷{/d}だわ。そしてそれを止める気は全くない様子だった」

languages.text: “无心者承受了根本不应该由他承受的负担。他的职责是治疗病人，可他却把那些大限未至的人们送到了不死之神手中。他很……{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}残忍{/d}，而且没有停手的打算。”
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man took on a burden that was not his to bear. His duty was to heal, but instead he sent people to the Undying One, people whose time had not yet come. He was... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. And had no intention of ever stopping."

traits.locale_text: “无心者承受了根本不应该由他承受的负担。他的职责是治疗病人，可他却把那些大限未至的人们送到了不死之神手里。他很……{d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}残忍{/d}，而且没有停手的打算。”

languages.text: "Der herzlose Mann nahm eine Bürde auf sich, die zu tragen nicht seine Aufgabe war. Seine Pflicht lautete, zu heilen, aber schickte er Leute zum Todlosen, deren Zeit noch nicht gekommen war. Er war ... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}grausam{/d}. Und hatte nicht die Absicht, jemals damit aufzuhören."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man took on a burden that was not his to bear. His duty was to heal, but instead he sent people to the Undying One, people whose time had not yet come. He was... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. And had no intention of ever stopping."

traits.locale_text: "Der Herzlose nahm eine Bürde auf sich, die zu tragen nicht seine Aufgabe war. Seine Pflicht lautete, zu heilen, aber schickte er Leute zum Todlosen, deren Zeit noch nicht gekommen war. Er war ... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}grausam{/d}. Und hatte nicht die Absicht, jemals damit aufzuhören."

languages.text: "Kalpsiz Adam, kendisine ait olmayan bir yükü üstlendi. Vazifesi iyileştirmekti. Ancak bunun yerine henüz vakti gelmemiş insanları Ölmeyen'e gönderdi. Yaptığı... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}Gaddarlıktı{/d}. Durmak gibi bir niyeti de yoktu."
languages.original_text: "The Heartless Man took on a burden that was not his to bear. His duty was to heal, but instead he sent people to the Undying One, people whose time had not yet come. He was... {d|Encyclopedia:CompKibellah_Humility}cruel{/d}. And had no intention of ever stopping."
